settings.custom_css: selector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item {n    overflow: visible;n    position: relative;n    z-index: 1;n    transition: all .3s;n    top: 0;n}nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery a {n    background: none;n    border: none;n    box-shadow: none;n    padding: 20px;n    margin: 0;n}nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item:hover {n    z-index: 2 !important;n    top: -20px;n}nnselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item:nth-child(4) {n    z-index: 0;n}nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery a img {n    margin-left: 0;n    box-shadow: 0 0 30px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.08);n    width: 78%;n}nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item:nth-child(4) img,nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item:nth-child(5) img,nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery-item:nth-child(6) img {n    margin-left: 35%;n    margin-top: -50%;n}nn@media(max-width: 1200px){n    selector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery a img {n    width: 90%;n}nselector .elementor-image-gallery .gallery a{n    padding: 0;n}n}
